entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is being asked if he got the locket. He is described as shouting and raising himself on his pillow.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who pulled out the locket from her pocket and handed it to Ron. She is also described as looking at the locket closely.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as the one who had the locket before. He is not physically present in the scene but is referred to by Hermione and Ron.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who received the locket from Hermione and examined it.

entities.name: locket
entities.description: The locket is described as being large like a chicken's egg, with an ornate letter S inlaid with small green stones.

relationships.description: Ron is asking if he got the locket.
Hermione pulled out the locket from her pocket and handed it to Ron.
Harry received the locket from Hermione and examined it.
Hermione is asking if someone destroyed the locket since Kreacher had it.
